attributes.action: Change the First Past The Post voting system to a Ranked Choice system
attributes.additional_details: First Past The Post is hugely unrepresentative, and other democracies worldwide make the UK look very undemocratic. A Ranked Choice Voting system would allow true representation of the people, and allow MPs to see what their constituents really want.
attributes.background: The First Past The Post voting system should be scrapped, and constituencies should instead use a Ranked Choice Voting system in local and general elections

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Replace First-Past-The-Post with Single Transferrable Vote & Alternative Vote
